body_html:
@GothaB : I'm guessing you were looking at some markdown files in github. Those may not have correct links, but the API docs on the TensorFlow website (www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/) are probably a better place to browse documentation anyway.

See tf.control_dependencies linked there and the link to Graph.control_dependencies from it.

Closing this issue out since I believe it has been resolved. Feel free to reopen/create a new one if I misunderstood.
